purpleculture_pinyin:
huàn
brilliant; lustrous
блестящий; блестящий
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 焕)
Pictophonetic: 奐 indicates the sound; 火 (fire) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
煥發 [ huàn fā ]: to shine; to glow; to irradiate; to flash
煥然一新 [ huàn rán yī xīn ]: to look completely new (idiom); brand new; changed beyond recognition
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 火 [ huǒ ] fire, flame; to burn; anger, rage
    • 奐 [ huàn ] numerous; brilliant
heisig_chinese_memo: The sled dogs faces are glowing while they warm up in front of the fire.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: In Alaska the sled dogs pull the firefighters toward the glowing flames.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " fire " to " huan " sound. The original meaning is firelight. "Shuowen Xinfu": "Huan, fire light. From the fire, Huan sound." Such as "Wen Xuan. Zhang Pingzi's "Si Xuan Fu": "The article is beautiful to be rotten, but beautiful to follow the wind." Li Zhouhan's note: "Huan, light."

" Huan " means bright and vivid. "Jade articles. Fire Department: "Huan, Ming Ye." Such as "The Analects. "Taber": "Huanhu! It has articles!" Zhu Xi's collection of notes: "Huan, a bright appearance." "Three Kingdoms. Wei Shu. "Zhu Xia Hou Cao Chuan": "There are big and small lines, but superior and inferior. Then the people who are in charge will also be different."

The idiom "Renewal" comes from Zhang Yanyuan's "Famous Paintings in Past Dynasties" of the Tang Dynasty. "The History of Famous Paintings. "On Forensic Collection, Buying for Reading and Playing": "It has famous Jin and Song dynasties, and it looks like new. It has been for hundreds of years, and the color of paper has not been defeated." Later, it changed the old appearance as "renewed" or "renewed." Glorious, presenting a new look or atmosphere. Such as "Awakening the World Constantly. Li Weigong meets a knight in a poor mansion": "An old saying goes: Seeing nothing to be desired makes the heart undisturbed. Fang De was originally a poor man. He was a poor man. He had never entered his body. Now he suddenly changed his mind. Class speaks carefully, and then feels reasonable."

" Huan " also means giving out and irradiating. For example, Chen Hong of the Tang Dynasty "Everlasting Regret Song Biography": "If you are out of water, you are weak and weak, if you don't let Luo Qi. Shine, turn to shine on people. It's joyful." Song Dynasty still used the "Harmony": "Good Pian Reading Rhyme Langlang, I really suspect that the stars are shining."
humanum_short_description_en: From " fire " to " huan " sound. The original meaning is fire, and the extension means bright and vivid.
humanum_full_description:
從「火」，「奐」聲。本義是火光。《說文新附》：「煥，火光也。从火，奐聲。」如《文選．張平子〈思玄賦〉》：「文章奐以粲爛兮，美紛紜以從風。」李周翰注：「煥，光。」

　　「煥」表示光亮、鮮明。《玉篇．火部》：「煥，明也。」如《論語．泰伯》：「煥乎！其有文章！」朱熹集注：「煥，光明之貌。」《三國志．魏書．諸夏侯曹傳》：「行有大小，比有高下，則所任之流，亦煥然明別矣。」

　　成語「煥然一新」語出唐代張彥遠《歷代名畫記》。《歷代名畫記．論鑒識收藏購求閱玩》：「其有晉宋名跡，煥然如新，已歷數百年，紙素彩色未甚敗。」後以「煥然如新」或「煥然一新」形容改變舊貌，發出光彩，呈現全新的面貌或氣象。如《醒世恒言．李汧公窮邸遇俠客》：「古語云：不見可欲，使心不亂。房德本是個貧士，這般華服，從不曾進體，如今忽地煥然一新，不覺移動其念，把眾人那班說話，細細一味，轉覺有理。」

　　「煥」還表示發放、照射。如唐代陳鴻〈長恨歌傳〉：「既出水，體弱力微，若不任羅綺。光彩煥發，轉動照人。上甚悅。」宋代尚用之〈和韻〉：「佳篇疾讀韻琅琅，真疑星斗煥光芒。」
humanum_short_description: 從「火」，「奐」聲。本義是火光，引申表示光亮、鮮明。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
煥 (Simplified: 焕)
Pinyin: huàn
English Definition: brilliant; lustrous
Total strokes: 13; Radical: 火
Pictophonetic: 奐 indicates the sound; 火 (fire) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 火 [ huǒ ] fire, flame; to burn; anger, rage
    • 奐 [ huàn ] numerous; brilliant
Example Words:
煥發 [ huàn fā ]: to shine; to glow; to irradiate; to flash
煥然一新 [ huàn rán yī xīn ]: to look completely new (idiom); brand new; changed beyond recognition
More: 煥* | *煥 | *煥*

從「 火 」，「 奐 」聲。本義是火光。《說文新附》：「煥，火光也。从火，奐聲。」如《文選．張平子〈思玄賦〉》：「文章奐以粲爛兮，美紛紜以從風。」李周翰注：「煥，光。」 「 煥 」表示光亮、鮮明。《玉篇．火部》：「煥，明也。」如《論語．泰伯》：「煥乎！其有文章！」朱熹集注：「煥，光明之貌。」《三國志．魏書．諸夏侯曹傳》：「行有大小，比有高下，則所任之流，亦煥然明別矣。」 成語「煥然一新」語出唐代張彥遠《歷代名畫記》。《歷代名畫記．論鑒識收藏購求閱玩》：「其有晉宋名跡，煥然如新，已歷數百年，紙素彩色未甚敗。」後以「煥然如新」或「煥然一新」形容改變舊貌，發出光彩，呈現全新的面貌或氣象。如《醒世恒言．李汧公窮邸遇俠客》：「古語云：不見可欲，使心不亂。房德本是個貧士，這般華服，從不曾進體，如今忽地煥然一新，不覺移動其念，把眾人那班說話，細細一味，轉覺有理。」 「 煥 」還表示發放、照射。如唐代陳鴻〈長恨歌傳〉：「既出水，體弱力微，若不任羅綺。光彩煥發，轉動照人。上甚悅。」宋代尚用之〈和韻〉：「佳篇疾讀韻琅琅，真疑星斗煥光芒。」

煥字的基本解释

煥
huàn
同“焕”。

煥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huàn］
亦作“烉1”。“焕1”的旧字形。

煥字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　煥； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页677第33
〔古文〕烉【唐韻】呼貫切【廣韻】火貫切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】呼玩切，?音喚。【說文】火光也。　又【玉篇】明也。【論語】煥乎其有文章。　又叶許縣切，音絢。【徐幹·齊都賦】雕琢有章，灼爛明煥。生民以來，非所視見。【玉篇】亦作奐。

煥字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
煥字的起名意思

暂无。
